manipulators.description: option + command + h = option + shift + left (select word ahead)
shift + h = ctrl + shift + tab (prev tab)
shift + option + h = mouse left fast
shift + control + h = mouse wheel left
shift + command + h = mouse wheel left fast
option + command + j = option + shift + down (select para ahead)
shift + option + j = mouse down fast
shift + control + j = mouse wheel down
shift + command + j = mouse wheel down fast
option + command + k = option + shift + up (select line above)
shift + option + k = mouse up fast
shift + control + k = mouse wheel up
shift + command + k = mouse wheel up fast
option + command + l = option + shift + right (select word after)
shift + option + l = mouse move right fast
shift + control + l = mouse wheel right
shift + command + l = mouse wheel right fast
shift + u = option + command + hyphen (zoom out)
shift + option + u = mouse left click
shift + control + u = mouse wheel left (rev)
shift + command + u = mouse wheel left (rev) fast
option + command + i = select whole line to head
shift + i = command + shift + ` (prev window within app)
control + i = command + h (hide current window)
shift + option + i = mouse move down fast
shift + control + i = mouse wheel down (rev)
shift + command + i = mouse wheel down (rev) fast
shift + o = command ` (next window within app)
control + o = option + command + h (expose all)
shift + control + o = mouse wheel up (rev)
shift + command + o = mouse wheel up (rev) fast
shift + p = option + command + equal_sign (zoom in)
shift + control + p = mouse wheel right (rev)
shift + command + p = mouse wheel right (rev) fast

rules.description: Quit application by pressing command-q twice
